entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:25 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mary's Harbour 2:30 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.5°C
Wind: NW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
